title: Do you know roughly when the damages or marks appeared on the will?
question: Do you know roughly when the damages or marks appeared on the will?
date: Date of roughly when the damages or marks happened to the will
dateHint:
Date of roughly when the damages or marks happened to the will
If you cannot remember the full date, enter just the year

willDamageDateKnown.required: Select ‘yes’ if you know roughly when the visible damages or marks appeared on the will

willdamagedate-year.required: Enter the year when visible damages or marks appeared on the will

willdamagedate-month.required: Please enter the month if you know the day it was damaged

willdamagedate.future: The date of when damages or marks appeared on the will must be in the past or today
